title: Shuttle xpc "silent mod" skipta ut viftu.

posts.text:
sælir.
Ef ég vil búa til alveg silent shuttle xpc vél.
( 
https://docs.google.com/viewer?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.shuttle.eu%2Ffileadmin%2Fresources%2Fdownload%2Fdocs%2Fspec%2Fbarebones%2FSZ68R5_e.pdf
 )
The standard cooling works well in the SZ68R5 with a 92mm Fan that runs between 900 and 3800 RPM. 
http://www.motormice.com/reviews/SZ68R5/cooling.htm
hvað eru hljóðlátustu vifturnar sem eru40mm og  92mm af stærð.  skipti kannski cpu viftunni út og einnig psu.

Allavega ekki hér á landi.
Fást hjá PerformancePC
40mm Noctua
http://www.performance-pcs.com/catalog/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=36_1127_123&products_id=35975
92mm Noctua
http://www.performance-pcs.com/catalog/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=36_1129_39&products_id=23673
